thread.title: Micromax Canvas Xpress 2 priced at Rs 5,999 in Flipkart sale
thread.title_full: Micromax Canvas Xpress 2 priced at Rs 5,999 in Flipkart sale | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Micromax Canvas Xpress 2 priced at Rs 5,999 in Flipkart sale
text:
Micromax is holding a flash sale of Canvas Xpress 2 on partner site Flipkart , priced at Rs 5,999. Micromax Canvas Xpress 2 is a new series of Flipkart only device.
Micromax Canvas Xpress 2 features a 5-inch 720p HD display, powered by a true octa-core 1.4GHz MediaTek MT6592 processor with Mali 450 GPU. The smartphone has 1GB RAm and 8GB internal memory further expandable to 32GB via microSD card.
The primary camera on the device is 13 megapixel and also sports a 2MP front facing camera. The smartphone runs on Android 4.4.2 Kitkat and has 2500mAh battery. The flash sale starts at 2PM on Flipkart.
 04, 2015 3:58 pm
